憁字的基本解释

憁
còng
鲁莽。
无知。
奔走。

憁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［còng］
［《音韻闡微》措甕切，去送］
亦作“愡1”。
见“憁恫”。
[②]［sōng］
亦作“愡2”。亦作“1”。
(1)见“憁2惺”。
(2)同“鬆”。

憁字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憁； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页401第25
【正韻】作孔切，音總。憁恫，不得意貌。　又【正韻】千弄切。義同。◎按玉篇集韻作愡。

憁字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
憁字的起名意思

暂无。

Embarrassed
Basic explanation of words
Embarrassed
còng
reckless.
ignorance.
run.
Embarrassed
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［còng］
[Cut the urn in the "Yin Yun Interpretation", and send it to me]
Also known as "shun 1".
See "Xiang".
[②] [sōng]
Also known as "愡2". Also called "1".
(1) See "Xian 2 Xian".
(2) Same as "pine".
Embarrassed
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憁; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 401 25
[Positive rhyme] Make hole cutting, total sound. Feeling embarrassed, not sorrowful.　[Zheng Yun] Qian Nong cut. The same meaning. ◎According to the jade chapter collection rhyme for stunned.
